channel.title: Integrated Chip (IC) on SPEECHCHIPS.COM
channel.description: Recent content in Integrated Chip (IC) on SPEECHCHIPS.COM

item.title: SC-01A
item.description: SC-01A Votrax # Features # Single CMOS chip 70 bits per second 22 pin package 9 ma. current drain Wide voltage supply range Latched 5V. compatible inputs Digital pitch level inputs Automatic inflection On-chip master clock circuit Optional external master clock Variety of voice effects Sound effects Manufacturer Description # The SC-01 Speech Synthesizer is a completely self-contained solid state device.

item.title: SP0256 AL2
item.description: SP0256-AL2 # The SP0256-AL2, also known as the “SPO256 Narrator Speech Processor”, produces all 59 phonemes of the English language plus 5 pauses of different durations. It’s part of the general “SP0” family and has many variants. Each of the phoneme’s speech patterns are individually addressable, making the SP0256-AL2 capable of saying anything that can be said in the English language. This is the simplest approach to universal speech synthesis and the speech quality is highly intelligible.
